subject: New York City Marathon
Running
Bicycles and Bicycling
Bone Fractures
lead_paragraph: After suffering stress fractures in his shins during his first New York City Marathon last year, Lance Armstrong vowed to never enter the event again. This year he broke that vow and posted an even better time.
snippet: After suffering stress fractures in his shins during his first New York City Marathon last year, Lance Armstrong vowed to never enter the event again. This year he broke that vow and posted an even better time.
